title: Kindred splash art on launch screen
body:
Not sure if it is just my client but on the launch screen Kindred doesn't appear on the rotation.
If I click onto the black link where it should be, Kindred's details come up.
Is this a bug or just my computer?
Anyone else finding this occurring?

replies.body: It's video settings for me, when I look at the normal splash art and it looks black at the shadows but normal everywhere else
